results.text: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
results.reason: Encourages believers to replace anxiety with prayer and thanksgiving.
results.reflection: Prayer and gratitude can calm our anxious hearts.

results.text: Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself. Each day has enough trouble of its own.
results.reason: Reminds us to focus on the present rather than being consumed by future worries.
results.reflection: Trust God with your future and live in the present moment.

results.text: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
results.reason: Encourages surrendering our worries to God who cares for us.
results.reflection: God is willing to carry our burdens if we are willing to let go.

results.text: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
results.reason: Assures believers that God will sustain and support them through their anxieties.
results.reflection: God's promise to sustain us brings comfort in times of worry.

results.text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: God's promise of strength and support in times of fear and anxiety.
results.reflection: God's presence and support can dispel our fears and anxieties.
